short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the CSS path to any element for pasting into Screenlapse.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to setup automatic screenshots of any web page element with the Screenlapse app.

NOTE: You must have an account on Screenlapse.com get the most out of this extension. But it does work as a general purpose CSS path finder, even without the use of Screenlapse for automated screenshots.
